qas.question: What Republic has maintained its control of Iran?
What type of sanctions has the US directed at Iran?
Iran has assisted what type of groups in Iraq?
When did the Iranian government enjoy something of a resurgence?
Who stated he wanted Israel to vanish?
What Republic has maintained its control of Afghanistan?
What type of sanctions has Canada directed at Iran?
Iran has assisted what type of groups in China?
When did the Iranian government not get a resurgence?
Who stated he did not want Israel to vanish?

context: <a0_1>The <a0_0><a0_2><b5_0>Islamic<b5_0/><a0_2/><a0_0/> Republic<a0_1/> has also maintained its hold on power in Iran in spite of US <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2><b6_0>economic<b6_0/><a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/> sanctions, and has created or assisted like-minded <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b7_0>Shia terrorist<b7_0/><a2_2/><a2_0/> groups<a2_1/> in Iraq, Egypt, Syria, Jordan (SCIRI) and Lebanon (Hezbollah) (two Muslim countries that also have large Shiite populations). <a3_0><b8_0>During <a3_1>the <a3_2>2006<a3_2/> Israel-Lebanon conflict<b8_0/><a3_1/><a3_0/>, the Iranian government enjoyed something of a resurgence in popularity amongst the predominantly Sunni "Arab street," due to its support for Hezbollah and to <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2><b9_0>President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad<a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/>'s<b9_0/> vehement opposition to the United States and his call that Israel shall vanish.
